kickuser_dm_msg: You've been kicked because your username is crafted in a way that unfortunately appears to be team-related and may inadvertently cause confusion in the community. To avoid confusion and scams we do not allow usernames confusingly similar to chain, support, admin, or core team. We encourage you to choose a new username and rejoin.
kickuser_channel_msg: ${kickUsername} (${kickServerId}) suspicious user blocked by Divi Guardian for impersonation of Support, Admin or Core Team. The real ${realUsername} and serverID ${realServerId}.
